an5.101:1.1: “Mendicants, these five qualities make a trainee assured.
an5.101:1.3: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.
an5.101:2.1: A person of faith doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who lacks faith.
an5.101:2.2: So this quality makes a trainee assured.
an5.101:3.1: An ethical person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is unethical.
an5.101:3.2: So this quality makes a trainee assured.
an5.101:4.1: A learned person doesn’t have the insecurities of a person of little learning.
an5.101:4.2: So this quality makes a trainee assured.
an5.101:5.1: An energetic person doesn’t have the insecurities of a lazy person.
an5.101:5.2: So this quality makes a trainee assured.
an5.101:6.1: A wise person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is witless.
an5.101:6.2: So this quality makes a trainee assured.
an5.101:6.3: These are the five qualities that make a trainee assured.”
